alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 21 at 3:32PM AKDT until October 24 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...High Surf will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast, Kivalina and Red Dog Dock, Shishmaref, Bering Strait Coast, Southern Seward Peninsula Coast and St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...From 10 PM Sunday to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Beach erosion will occur, especially on south and west facing shorelines. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds 25-35 kt over the Western Bering Sea will spread to the Eastern Bering and Chukchi Seas Sunday afternoon, and over the West Coast of Alaska Sunday night. Gusts to 60 mph will occur through the Bering Strait and at Cape Lisburne Sunday night and Mon.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Western Arctic Coast
